Acer_monspessulanum.Shape_and_Structure: Spherical crown. Straight main trunk with branches. Drooping foliage.
Acer_monspessulanum.Spring_Color: Bright green upper side, whitish green underside

Olea_europea.Shape_and_Structure: Irregular crown. Irregular main trunk with bifurcations..

Ramaje_tortuoso.Spring_Color: Dark green upper side, silvery green underside

Platanus_orientalis.Shape_and_Structure: Ovoid crown. Straight main trunk. Expansive branching.
Platanus_orientalis.Spring_Color: Medium green upper side, light green underside

Quercus_ilex.Shape_and_Structure: Spherical or irregularly elliptical crown. Straight main trunk. Twisted branches.
